heading: SELECTED PRODUCTS
text: The protagonist of your pizza is the dough. It is mixed in a controlled environment from the finest ground flour TYPE 00, which arrives directly from Italy especially for PIZZALAB. To make your pizza taste even fresher, the vegetables are cut every day! With us, you will make sure that eating healthy with delicious pizza is not just a fairy tale. Our gluten-free/vegan dough option has an irresistible taste. It is a wonderful opportunity for lovers of gluten-free diets, and not only, to add pizza to their menu. You can find more information and interesting facts about individual products by clicking on the corresponding icon.
